column4: hi, me again. I'm planning on wiping my entire disk with dban (someone said it might work). how can i format my usb drive and will dban work using netbootin? + i would like to know if bios and that stuff stays intact on my computer? thank you!
someone told me that because everything failed (every type of ubu install + one opensuse install) that i should try it, and then try to install the system...
what's dd? (sorry, not trying to troll, really dont know)
or use gparted to delete / re-create the partition(s)
